node.title: Wanted: Dead & Alive
node.description: On January 11, 2009, Marc Schrenker attempted to fake his own death by claiming to air traffic controllers that the windshield of his two million dollar plane had imploded, then parachuting into the rural forest below. Why? He wanted to end his old, messed up life, and begin anew. But his plan failed miserably. There’s a better way! God has in fact provided a way by which we can be done with the old and usher in the new. Join us during our worship hour as we explore this wonderful opportunity in the sixth chapter of Romans.
